nodes.text: The Coolant Overflow, so named for the excess coolant dumped in the area, was a sector of Network Access, part of the Network Security District of the moon Nar Shaddaa during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. The Hutt Cartel maintained a datacenter in the area.
The Coolant Overflow appears as part of Network Access on Nar Shaddaa in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011.
